author: David Aaro
title: Ford to produce roughly 50,000 ventilators in fight against coronavirus
description: Ford Motor Company has announced plans to make 50,000 ventilators at one of its Michigan plants over the next 100 days in an effort to arm those on the front lines with equipment to fight COVID-19.
content:
